section.heading: Information reporting.
section.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the Bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(e) of Bryant Street Tax Increment Financing Emergency Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-13, Feb. 25, 2019, 66 DCR 2467).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(e) of Bryant Street Tax Increment Financing Temporary Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Law 23-5, Apr. 18, 2019, 66 DCR 2696).
